title: I'm tired
content: My eyes hurt. Blue blockers are overrated.

title: Screenshots
content: I took screenshots of your code. I'm going to use those screenshots to help me out. Hopefully I can think of something creative to make it my own.

title: Web meetings
content: I wish I could make it to the web meetings! My eyes hurt.

title: I hope this starts to make more
content: I miss JavScript. It was just starting to make sense, and then BOOM React. My eyes hurt!
